statements: SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionTracking ORDER BY gene_id ASC
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionTracking WHERE expression_level > 100
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionTracking WHERE time_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY time_recorded DESC
SELECT gene_id, expression_level, time_recorded FROM GeneExpressionTracking WHERE gene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM GeneExpressionTracking
SELECT gene_id, expression_level, time_recorded FROM GeneExpressionTracking ORDER BY time_recorded DESC;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionTracking WHERE expression_level > 100 ORDER BY expression_level DESC, time_recorded;
SELECT gene_id, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM GeneExpressionTracking GROUP BY gene_id HAVING num_records > 5;
SELECT AVG(expression_level) as avg_expression FROM GeneExpressionTracking;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_id FROM GeneExpressionTracking ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_tracking;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level, time_stamp FROM gene_expression_tracking ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_description FROM gene_metadata;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description, gene_id FROM gene_metadata WHERE gene_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_tracking WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_metadata WHERE gene_id = 10;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM gene_metadata WHERE gene_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_tracking WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression_tracking WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM gene_metadata WHERE gene_name LIKE 'AT%';
SELECT * FROM gene_expression;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT gene_name, description FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT gene_id, timepoint_id FROM gene_expression JOIN timepoints ON gene_expression.timepoint = timepoints.timepoint_id;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY gene_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_name LIKE 'geneA%' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM timepoints WHERE timepoint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression JOIN gene_annotations ON gene_expression.gene_id = gene_annotations.gene_id ORDER BY expression_level DESC, gene_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT gene_id, timepoint_name, timepoint_date FROM gene_expression JOIN timepoints ON gene_expression.timepoint = timepoints.timepoint_id WHERE timepoint_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY timepoint_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpression;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_description FROM GeneInfo;
SELECT time_point_id, time_description FROM TimePoint;
SELECT log_id, experiment_date, researcher_name FROM ExperimentLog;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level, time_point FROM GeneExpression;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM GeneInfo WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level, time_point FROM GeneExpression WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY time_point DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_genes FROM GeneInfo;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, time_description FROM GeneInfo JOIN TimePoint ON GeneInfo.gene_id = TimePoint.time_point_id;
SELECT experiment_date, researcher_name FROM ExperimentLog WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpression;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneInfo WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, time_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionLog ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_id, max_expression, avg_expression FROM GeneExpressionStats WHERE avg_expression > 50;
SELECT gene_id, time, time_id FROM TimePoints ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpression;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, time FROM GeneInfo JOIN GeneExpression ON GeneInfo.gene_id = GeneExpression.gene_id;
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM GeneExpression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_name, avg_expression FROM GeneInfo JOIN GeneExpressionStats ON GeneInfo.gene_id = GeneExpressionStats.gene_id ORDER BY avg_expression DESC;
SELECT gene_name, description, expression_level FROM GeneInfo JOIN GeneExpression ON GeneInfo.gene_id = GeneExpression.gene_id WHERE expression_level > 50;
